choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews
Okay, here is your meal plan for the day without dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachio and cashew. Breakfast: Start with a glass of water with lemon juice to kick start digestion. For breakfast, have some steel cut oats cooked in coconut milk or soy milk (if you are vegan), sprinkled with chia seeds and fresh fruits like banana and blueberries. Lunch: Have a salad made up of mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber slices, avocado slices and tofu cubes tossed in olive oil and lemon juice dressing. Dinner: Make some quinoa cooked in vegetable broth with steamed veggies like carrots, beans, peas and asparagus for a balanced meal. Snack: Have roasted chickpeas or pepitas (little squash seeds) to munch on during the day.
